page.title: 10Communications Uzmaston area
page.content: The Cartlett, Railway Station area and Uzmaston Road as far as the corner of Creamson Road have town area services, ie. letter delivery on foot at 0800 hours and combined letter and parcel delivery by van at 1200 hours. The remainder of the area has a combined letter and parcel delivery by van at 0745 hours. There are 4 letter boxes, (Station, New Road, Uzmaston, Bethany Row). The first 2 have 4 collections between 0830 and 1730 Monday-Friday, the Station having one collection Saturday 1215 and New Road 0930 and 1215. Uzmaston has collections at 0745 and 1615 weekdays, 0745 on Saturdays. Bethany Row times are 1130 and 1600 (1130 Saturday).Letters cost 17 or 13 pence, first or second class. There is no Post Office within the area but full Postal and Giro Services are available at Haverfordwest.
